GBDI Arboretum Documentation

Release 1

Introduction

This library implements various Metric Methods Access...

Contents

This version implements the following MAMs:

  • Dummy-Tree (Sequential scan)
  • Slim-Tree

Additionally, it has the following under development MAMs:

  • DBM-Tree
  • Partition-Tree
